rename.from: Pagination::getLinks() doesn't return a WHOLE set of link
rename.to: Pagination::getLinks() doesn't return a WHOLE set of links

body: There's no previous page if you're on the first page and no next page if you're on the last page. Docs should be adjusted to indicate it.
But first and last pages always exist regardless of the current page.
They do. That could be considered a bug and fixed.

issue.title: Pagination::getLinks() doesn't return a WHOLE set of links
issue.body:
This issue has originally been reported by @ptz-nerf at https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/issues/16418.
Moved here by @samdark.

-----

https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/blob/ec937d004ac82546c77c5302086520045e976d22/framework/data/Pagination.php#L325-L332
What are these conditions for? The documentation states that all links will be returned.

body: Would you like to send a pull request fixing it?

@samdark в процессе стало ясно, что не все так просто, как кажется. `yii\rest\Serializer` использует его, не уверен, что там всегда должны присутствовать ссылки на первую и последнюю страницы. Не фича ли это?) Если должны, то должны ли они быть и совпадать, если всего одна страница?

issue.title: Fixed `Pagination::getLinks()` to provide links to the first and the last page when possible (#16418)
